event.title: RPA (Robotic Process Automation) Training Free Demo
event.description:
Intellipaat is organising a free demo for RPA Training Online. The demo is for the RPA Training in Bangalore is offered by Intellipaat, Which Specialises in training RPA courses on RPA tools Like Blue Prism Training, ui path training, Automation anywhere . RPA training i to help master CNN, Tensorflow, graph visualization, RNN, Deep learning libraries, back propagation and much more.

What will you learn in this Robotic Process Automation(RPA)Course?

Fundamentals of Robotic Process Automation
Designing an RPA solution
Capturing and interpreting applications
GUI Automation with UiPath
Automation of back office processes
Exception handling and debugging

Who can join the RPA Demo event?

This event can be joined by the Software Engineers, Software Testing and IT professionals.

What should you know before joining this event?

Before joining the event, you should know the basics of RPA. Here are few free resources for those who want to learn RPA and become an RPA Developer
:

RPA Tutorial
RPA Interview Questions and Answers
